name: Jods Havoc Demon Hunter Suite - Dragonflight

I do not plan to become a Class Aura maintainer I'm merely creating auras for my Personal use 

All Class Packs:
[list]
[*][url=https://wago.io/DemonHunter][color=#A330C9]Havoc Demon Hunter[/color][/url] 
[*][url=https://wago.io/BalanceDruid][color=#FF7C0A]Balance Druid[/color][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000]
To get the Aura Visually the exact same you need [url=https://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info25064-CleanIcons-MechagnomeEdition]Clean Icons-MechagnomeEdition[/url] and [url=https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/omni-cc]omnicc[/url]
[/color][/b]
Auras Visually Inspired by [url=https://wago.io/LuxthosDruidDragonflight]Luxthos[/url] but with less shenanigans
Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].


If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]
description.html:
I do not plan to become a Class Aura maintainer I'm merely creating auras for my Personal use All Class Packs:
  • Havoc Demon Hunter
  • Balance Druid
  • Warlock
  • Elemental Shaman
  • Retribution Paladin
  • Shadow Priest
To get the Aura Visually the exact same you need Clean Icons-MechagnomeEdition and omnicc Auras Visually Inspired by Luxthos but with less shenanigans Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. If you like my work and want to support me you can donate

changelog.text: fixed essence break to not trigger of others
added debuff active display during essencebreak
moved sigil of flame to utilitys
